p.style: margin-bottom: 6px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

span.strong: We hope you're all staying well! Sadly, we will finish our year with remote learning. This is not what we had hoped for, but we understand and will continue to prioritize everyone's health during these times by following these orders. Please continue reading for important information and dates to finish up the school year.

p.style: margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 6px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

span.strong: The next pick-up for remote learning items will be Monday, April 27th from 9-11am during the food program and from 1-4pm using the Middle/High Cafeteria. Please stay in your vehicles and work will be brought out to you! This will be the last time to pick remote learning items up for the rest of the school year.

div.style: display: inline; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

span.strong: If you need to return items to teachers or books to the library, you can bring them with you during these times.

div.style: display: inline; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

span.strong: We will have a schedule for returning all district technology devices loaned out and gathering all student items during the week of May 18th. Details will be shared closer to that week.

div.style: display: inline; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

span.strong:
Last Day for Seniors will be Friday, May 8th!
Last Day for all other students will be Friday, May 15th!

div.style: display: inline; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

span.strong: Thank you all for making this remote learning time such a success! We hope you are all able to stay well, and please let us know if you need anything!

strong.span: It's a Great Day to be an EAGLE!!
